PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-10782022-10-07PCH,  ,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the designation by the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada of ANGELA J. CASSIE of Winnipeg, Manitoba, to be Acting Director of the National Gallery of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of nine months or until such time as a new Director is appointed, whichever occurs first, effective October 8, 2022.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the designation by the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada of ANGELA J. CASSIE of Winnipeg, Manitoba, to be Acting Director of the National Gallery of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of nine months or until such time as a new Director is appointed, whichever occurs first, effective October 8, 2022.
